member.name: D3D10_INFO_QUEUE_FILTER
member.summary: Debug message filter; contains a lists of message types to allow or deny.

member.name: D3D10_INFO_QUEUE_FILTER.AllowList
member.summary: A structure describing the types of messages the info queue should allow.

member.name: D3D10_INFO_QUEUE_FILTER.DenyList
member.summary: A structure describing the types of messages the info queue should reject.
